m:document.m:desc: Creates a record of provenance metadata associated with a transformation.
m:document.m:input: Source documents that were used during the transformation.
m:document.m:param: Used to control whether the result should include or exclude the name of the person who started the transformation (if available).
The date and time when the transformation process began.
m:document.m:return: A prov:Bundle as an XML document
